Free

£0 /month

For those that have a couple of playlists they want to manage.

  • 10 Actions /month
  • Monitor 2 Playlists
  • Schedule 5 Track Releases
  • Schedule 2 Playlist Releases
choose plan

Premium

£5.99 /month

For those small business, or independent curators.

  • Unlimited Actions
  • Monitor 20 Playlists
  • Schedule 40 Track Releases
  • Schedule 20 Playlist Releases
choose plan

Business

£99.99 /month

For those large businesses with hundreds of playlists.

  • Unlimited Actions
  • Monitor Unlimited Playlists
  • Schedule Unlimited Track Releases
  • Schedule Unlimited Playlist Releases
choose plan
